title: Configure Cognee knowledge base for btc-algo-trading
description: Set up isolated Cognee stack with unique ports, update all scripts and documentation to use btc-specific datasets and configuration.
close_reason: Implemented: docker-compose with unique ports (8001, 5434, 6381, 7475, 7688), updated scripts, created .env.example, synced 4 datasets to Cognee

title: Optimize BTCMomentumScalper strategy parameters
close_reason: BTCMomentumScalper strategy abandoned after poor backtest results (-12% bull, +0.36% bear). Project pivoted to Avellaneda-Stoikov market making.

title: Download Binance BTC/USDT data (2017-present)
close_reason: Downloaded BinanceUS BTC/USD 5m data (501k candles). Note: Data gap Jul 2023 - Feb 2025 due to BinanceUS regulatory issues

title: Update PLAN.md with completed A-S milestones
description:
PLAN.md still shows M1-M4 milestones as unchecked, but all are implemented.

## Updates Needed
- Mark M1 (Core Model) as complete
- Mark M2 (Order Management) as complete  
- Mark M3 (Backtesting Framework) as complete
- Mark M4 (Parameter Optimization) as complete
- Add M5: Paper Trading Validation
- Add M6: Live Trading Deployment
- Update Open Questions section

title: Backtest BTCMomentumScalper strategy
close_reason: Full backtest complete: -12% (2019-2023, bull market), +0.36% (2025-2026, bear market). Strategy needs optimization - performs better in sideways/bear markets

title: Download Bitstamp data (2012-2017)
close_reason: Closing legacy data pipeline tasks. Project pivoted to Avellaneda-Stoikov market making with existing Binance data (2017-present). A-S backtesting complete with +43% annual return in ranging markets.

title: Backtesting Pipeline Setup
close_reason: Backtesting pipeline fully implemented as part of Avellaneda-Stoikov infrastructure. See strategies/avellaneda_stoikov/simulator.py and scripts/run_as_backtest.py

title: Analyze performance by market regime
close_reason: Market regime analysis implemented in Avellaneda-Stoikov strategy. ADX-based regime detection in strategies/avellaneda_stoikov/regime.py filters for ranging markets (ADX < 25).

title: Tune A-S parameters from paper trading results
description:
Adjust Avellaneda-Stoikov parameters based on paper trading observations.

## Parameters to Evaluate
- Risk aversion (Î³) - currently 0.1
- Volatility window - currently 20 candles  
- MIN_SPREAD - currently 0.4% (optimized config)
- ADX threshold - currently 25 for regime filter

## Goals
- Improve fill rate while maintaining profitability
- Reduce inventory risk exposure
- Optimize for Sharpe ratio in live conditions

title: Prepare for live trading deployment
description:
Set up infrastructure for real money trading on Bybit mainnet.

## Checklist
- [ ] Create Bybit mainnet API keys (read + trade permissions)
- [ ] Configure mainnet credentials securely (env vars, not in code)
- [ ] Set initial capital allocation (start small: $500-1000)
- [ ] Implement kill switch / emergency stop
- [ ] Set up monitoring and alerting
- [ ] Document risk limits and stop-loss rules

## Risk Management
- Max position size limits
- Daily loss limits
- Automatic shutdown on anomalies

title: Run A-S paper trading on Bybit testnet
description:
Validate Avellaneda-Stoikov strategy in live market conditions using Bybit testnet paper trading.

## Acceptance Criteria
- Run paper trader for minimum 1 week
- Monitor fill rates, spread capture, and inventory management
- Track P&L vs backtest expectations
- Identify any issues with live execution (latency, WebSocket stability)

## Resources
- scripts/run_paper_trader.py
- strategies/avellaneda_stoikov/live_trader.py
- config_hft.py settings
